title: Divorce Italian Style
plot: A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.

title: Some Like It Hot
plot: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

title: I Remember
plot: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

title: Il Sorpasso
plot: An impulsive braggart takes a shy law student with him for a two-day road trip from Rome to Tuscany.
